subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez said that his cousin Yuri Sucart, who accompanies him on some trips, was not violating restrictions imposed after Sucart was implicated in Rodriguez’s past steroid use.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez said that his cousin Yuri Sucart, who accompanies him on some trips, was not violating restrictions imposed after Sucart was implicated in Rodriguez’s past steroid use.
